net.jawr.web.resource.bundle.renderer

Class RendererFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.jawr.web.resource.bundle.renderer.RendererFactory

  • public class RendererFactory
extends Object
    This class defines the bundleRendererLink factory The factory which instanciates the link renderer.
    Author:
    ibrahim Chaehoi

                                       Boolean useRandomParam,
                                       Boolean async,
                                       Boolean defer)
        Returns the JS Bundle renderer
        Parameters:
        bundler - the ResourceBundlesHandler
        useRandomParam - the flag indicating if it should use the random param
        async - the flag indicating the value of the async attribute
        defer - the flag indicating the value of the deferred attribute
        Returns:
        the JS Bundle renderer

                                         Boolean useRandomParam,
                                         String media,
                                         boolean alternate,
                                         boolean displayAlternateStyles,
                                         String title)
        Returns the CSS Bundle renderer
        Parameters:
        bundler - the bundler
        useRandomParam - the flag indicating if we use the random flag
        media - the media
        alternate - the alternate flag
        displayAlternateStyles - the flag indicating if the alternate styles must be displayed
        title - the title
        Returns:
        the Css Bundle renderer
